sect2.title: Installation of Zlib
sect2.para: Install Zlib by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: ./configure --prefix=/usr --shared && make LIBS="libz.so.1.1.4 libz.a" && make LIBS="libz.so.1.1.4 libz.a" install && mv /usr/lib/libz.so.* /lib && ln -sf ../../lib/libz.so.1 /usr/lib/libz.so && cp zlib.3 /usr/share/man/man3
